entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
